properties.displayName: Logged-On User Password Change Via Ksetup.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains " /ChangePassword " and (FolderPath endswith "\\ksetup.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "ksetup.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects password change for the logged-on user's via "ksetup.e
